survey_questions.Do_you_think_a_creature_system_can_have_: Do you think a creature/system can have intentions/goals without being conscious?
survey_questions.Do_you_think_a_creature_system_can_be_co: Do you think a creature/system can be conscious without having intentions/goals?
survey_questions.Do_you_think_a_creature_system_can_have_: Do you think a creature/system can have positive or negative sensations (pleasure/pain) without being conscious?
survey_questions.Do_you_think_a_creature_system_can_be_co: Do you think a creature/system can be conscious without having positive or negative sensations (pleasure/pain)?
survey_questions.A_creature_system_that_can_only_feel_pos: A creature/system that can only feel positive/negative sensations (pleasure/pain), but is not conscious (not experiencing) and does not have plans/goals or intentions (for example, can't plan to avoid something that causes pain)
survey_questions.A_creature_system_that_only_has_plans_go: A creature/system that only has plans/goals and intentions (can plan to perform certain actions in the future), but is not conscious (not experiencing) and cannot feel positive/negative sensations (pleasure/pain)
survey_questions.A_creature_system_that_does_not_have_pla: A creature/system that does not have plans/goals or intentions, and cannot feel positive/negative sensations (pleasure/pain), but is conscious (for example, sees colors, but does not feel anything negative or positive, and cannot plan)
survey_questions.A_creature_system_that_is_both_conscious: A creature/system that is both conscious (has experiences) and has plans/goals and intentions (can plan to perform certain actions in the future), but cannot feel positive/negative sensations (pleasure/pain)

A creature/system that is both conscious (has experiences) and can feel positive/negative sensations (pleasure/pain), but does not have plans/goals or intentions (for example, can't plan to avoid something that causes pain)
survey_questions.A_creature_system_that_can_feel_positive: A creature/system that can feel positive/negative sensations (pleasure/pain) and also has plans/goals and intentions (can plan to perform certain actions in the future), but is not conscious (not experiencing)
survey_questions.Do_you_think_non-conscious_creatures_sys: Do you think non-conscious creatures/systems should be taken into account in moral decisions?
survey_questions.Do_you_think_conscious_creatures_systems: Do you think conscious creatures/systems should be taken into account in moral decisions?
survey_questions.Do_you_think_some_people_should_have_a_h: Do you think some people should have a higher moral status than others?
survey_questions.Do_you_think_some_non-human_animals_shou: Do you think some non-human animals should have a higher moral status than others?
survey_questions.If_two_creatures_systems_are_conscious_t: If two creatures/systems are conscious, they are equally conscious
If two creatures/systems are conscious, they are not necessarily equally conscious
survey_questions.Does_it_mean_that_the_interests_of_the_m: Does it mean that the interests of the more conscious entity matter more?
survey_questions.Assuming_two_different_creatures_systems: Assuming two different creatures/systems are conscious, their consciousness is incomparable
survey_questions.Do_you_think_consciousness_and_intellige: Do you think consciousness and intelligence are related?
